ygData.subject: Other

From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

I am probably going to create a simple poll to count how many people 
are interested in playing in a tournament.

Since I know that no people will be reading this message, I might as 
well say what I really feel.  Just joking.

When I finish my current scenario I am working on, I plan on doing a 
true maze [I have the inspiration], which will rival 'The Stairs' 
scenarios and 'The Labryinth' from the tevifty in ability to get lost. 
 Most of it will revolve around teleporters.  Fortunately, I will only 
use non-mobile opponents in that scenario; unfortunately, they will 
be invisible.  I haven't quite figured out where it belongs right now.

After that scenario, I plan on redoing some of Ocean-going scenarios 
to make them more realistic as suggested by Telvido in a private email 
to me.  Other scenarios I do have in mind are 'Columnbine', 'Undead 
Rebellion', and 'The Slime Master'.

Deep down, I don't consider any of my current scenarios a maze ('Hedge 
Free At Last' almost qualifies) for twoe simple reasons:  There is 
only 1 path to take to get to the ending and there are no alternate 
paths to get lost in.
